column1: 272111,Careers Counsellor,,"Counsel clients regarding educational or vocational issues
column3: Complete documentation required by programs or regulations
column5: Advise others on career or personal development
column7: Support individuals with diverse needs to understand, access and utilise information or services
column9: Evaluate characteristics of individuals to determine needs or eligibility
column11: Refer individuals to educational or work programs
column15: Maintain a working understanding of the cultural, diversity and accessibility needs of others, and how this applies to the role
column17: Interview clients to gather information about their backgrounds, needs or progress
column21: Teach life skills or strategies to clients or their families
column23: Advise others on social or educational issues
column27: Collaborate with other professionals to develop education or assistance programs
column33: Assess individual or community needs for educational or social services
column35: Refer clients to community or social service programs
column37: Develop working relationships with others to facilitate program activities
column41: Intervene in crisis situations to assist clients
column43: Collaborate with other professionals to assess client needs or plan treatments
column45: Confer with family members to discuss client treatment plans or progress
column49: Plan programs to address community mental wellness needs
column51: Counsel clients or patients regarding personal issues
column53: Present social services program information to the public
column55: Supervise workers providing client or patient services
column57: Evaluate potential problems in home or work environments of clients
column59: Train staff members in social services skills
column61: Assist clients in handling details of daily life",0.2339366219634469
